patients.name: Liora
patients.currentStatus: Liora has moderately elevated blood glucose levels despite regular medication adherence. She reports occasional numbness in her feet and increased fatigue. Her last checkup indicated early signs of peripheral neuropathy, and her physician advised tighter glucose monitoring.

patients.name: Marcus
patients.currentStatus: Marcus experiences fluctuating blood pressure levels, especially during periods of stress. He reports mild headaches and occasional dizziness. His last clinical review showed borderline left-ventricular thickening, suggesting the need for consistent blood pressure control.

patients.name: Selene
patients.currentStatus: Selene has a persistent productive cough and shortness of breath during light physical activity. Recent spirometry results show a decline from her baseline. Her physician noted mild exacerbation symptoms and recommended closer monitoring of respiratory function.

precautions: Monitor glucose levels closely during illness or unusual activity.
Ensure regular eye checks to detect early vision changes.
Provide supervision during physical activity to avoid overexertion.
Check feet weekly for cuts or bruises.
Track appetite and energy changes and report patterns.

generalRecommendations: Balanced meals: lean protein + whole grains + vegetables.
Avoid sugary drinks; choose water or diluted juice.

lastMealGuidance.highCarbSugary: Choose a low-GI snack (nuts, plain yogurt) and monitor glucose.
lastMealGuidance.highFatHeavy: Offer small, fibrous snack (apple, carrot sticks) and delay large meals.
lastMealGuidance.skipped: Give a small balanced meal (scrambled egg + whole-grain toast) to prevent hypoglycemia.

generalRecommendations: Low-glycemic foods: brown rice, quinoa, beans.
Limit refined sugar and white-flour foods.
Vegetables and high-fiber fruits: berries, pears.

lastMealGuidance.highCarbSugary: Prioritize protein+veg (grilled chicken salad) and avoid extra carbs.
lastMealGuidance.highFatHeavy: Choose a light, fiber-rich meal (vegetable soup + whole-grain roll).
lastMealGuidance.skipped: Eat a small balanced meal with protein and complex carbs to stabilise glucose.
